snippet: Shares of Microsoft, Intuitive Surgical and the uniform rental company Cintas rose for the day, with the tech sector leading the way....
abstract: Stocks advance to record highs once again, led by strong tech shares.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Microsoft, Intuitive Surgical and the uniform rental company Cintas rose for the day, with the tech sector leading the way.

headline.main: Wall St. Gains as Earnings Cheer Traders
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Edges Into Record Territory as Earnings Cheer Traders
